IRIS is a global data warehouse containing data from US and other affiliates. It consists of staging, Integration, Service and Datamart layers. Staging layers dumps data directly as obtained from sources. Integration layer is used to store the historical data while service layer has aggregated current snapshot and Datamart layer is used for Reporting and Analysis part by the end users.
